name: Azure Managed SQL
description: Azure is a cloud platform which also provides managed SQL servers. For our current customers we use managed databases to build a data platform.

name: Kubernetes

name: Databricks
description: For some customers we already work with Databricks for solutions in their infrastructure. However we are not yet sure to recommend it in greenfield situations.

name: Azure Functions
description: In the past we have build some data pipelines in Azure Functions. Due to complexity in the orchestration and monitoring of pipelines, we recommend to use other solutions for monitoring and scheduling pipelines.

name: Poetry
description: Poetry is a dependency and package manager for Python.

name: Docker
description: Docker is a container runtime that we use for testing, packaging pipelines and CI/CD components.

name: Semantic Release
description: We use Semantic Release for a few of our projects to automate the release and release note generation.

name: Pre-commit
description: Pre-commit helps you to run some checks on your code before committing. We have implemented it for a few projects.

name: Dagster
description: Dagster is an orchestrator and potential alternative to Airflow.

name: Python
description: Python is a programming language. Currently we use version 3.8.

name: Terraform
description: Terraform is a language which can be used for IaC. Currently it is the preferred language for new projects that need Iac. We are still working on completing the guidelines on how to do it properly.

name: ARM templates
description: We have use ARM templates as IaC language for some projects in the past. The benefits of Terraform in terms of modularizing infrastructure, makes that we prefer Terraform as a tool for IaC.

name: Lakehouse architecture
description: The Lakehouse is a new hybrid form between a data lake and data warehouse. It has the scalability characteristic of a data lake, while having the discoverability of a data warehouse. It is often realized by combining a query engine (Spark / Presto), file or blob storage (Azure Blob Storage) and metadata component (Hive).
